isis.stitle: TSI 08-05-01 - ProStar Power Steering Cooler Hoses

geninfo.para: ProStar Tractors built after June 2, 2008 will now have type 6 Power Steering cooler hoses P/N 2644104R1 with type 6 hose clamp P/N 2022867C1.

ProStar tractors built before June 2, 2008 that operate in extreme cold climates with type 1 hose P/N 2643655R1 with type 1 clamps P/N 3576742C1 may experience fluid weepage at the hose to cooler location. To correct, please replace the type 1 hose and clamp with the type 6 hose and clamp. Type 6 hose is cloth covered and the part number 2644104R1 is stamped on it every few feet. Do not use the type 1 hose clamp with the type 6 hose.

svcproc.title: Service Procedure

para.emph: GOVERNMENT REGULATION: Engine fluids (oil, fuel, and coolant) may be a hazard to human health and the environment. Handle all fluids and other contaminated materials (e.g. filters, rags) in accordance with applicable regulations. Recycle or dispose of engine fluids, filters, and other contaminated materials according to applicable regulations.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of EGES 415 Engine Service Manual.
To prevent personal injury or death, shift transmission to park or neutral, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.
To prevent personal injury or death, allow engine to cool before working with components.

To prevent personal injury or death, do not let engine fluids stay on your skin. Clean skin and nails using hand cleaner and wash with soap and water. Wash or discard clothing and rags contaminated with engine fluids.
